metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7837 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: SVG loaded through "" tags can use "" tags within the SVG datato set cookies for that page. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 57. Update Instructions: Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7837` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions: firefox - 57.0+build4-0ubuntu0.16.04.5 firefox-globalmenu - 57.0+build4-0ubuntu0.16.04.5 firefox-mozsymbols - 57.0+build4-0ubuntu0.16.04.5 firefox-testsuite - 57.0+build4-0ubuntu0.16.04.5 No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '57.0+build4-0ubuntu0.16.04.5').
